d: A FreeSewing pattern for a pair of leggings

s.bulgeToLarge: The value for the bulge is too large, and this cannot be made to fit. It is adjusted accordingly.
s.couldNotFitCircle: Could not make the circle fit
s.couldNotFitFrontOutside: Could not make the front outside to fit
s.couldNotFitFrontGussetPath: Could not make the front gusset path to fit
s.couldNotCreateWaistCircle: Could not create the waist curve
s.couldNotCreateWaistBack: Could not create the waist back

waistband.d: Add a separate waistband to the design

waistbandNo.d: Do not add a separate waistband

backgusset.d: Add a circular gusset in the back

backgussetYes.d: Back gusset with option to butt lift added

cyclingchamois.d: Allow for a chamois to be added. This sets some of the percentages, and automatically enables certain features

cyclingchamoisYes.d: Support for a chamois has been added

cyclingchamoisNo.d: All settings can be individually set

frontbulge.d: Add a bulge in the front

frontbulgeYes.d: Add a bulge in the front

ease.d: This controls the amount of ease. Since this is a pattern for leggings that is normally made of stretch fabric, the ease is negative, meaning the fabric is stretched around the body.

leglength.d: The length of the legs. A percentage of the inseam measurement.

waistlowering.d: Lowering of the waist. This is a percentage of the Waist-To-Hips measurement.

gussetwidth.d: Width of the gusset. This is a percentage of the front cross seam.

backgussetwidth.d: The width of the gusset in the back. This is a percentage of the hips circumference.

frontgussetlength.d: This configures how far the gusset should extend in the front. This is a percentage of the front cross seam.

waistbandsize.d: Size (height) of the waistband. This is a percentage of the Waist-To-Hips measurement.

waistreduction.d: The amount by which the waist should be reduced. This is a percentage of the waist circumference. Only available when the waistband option is selected.

buttlift.d: This setting controls the shape of the back gusset, thereby creating more or less support to lift the buttocks

frontbulgesize.d: The size of the front bulge. This is a percentage of the front cross seam. (Take it easy, you need less than you think, big boy)
